resource_dependency.courseCatalogSchema: Database table 'courses' with fields: course_id (unique ID), title (string), description (text), category (string), difficulty_level (string), certification_track (string), schedule (datetime), enrollment_deadline (datetime), available_seats (integer), prerequisites (text), instructor (string), price (decimal).

function: Display a searchable and filterable course catalog with course listings.
static_description: A full-width section with a lavender background containing a centered search bar and filter options above a grid of course cards. Each card displays course title, category, difficulty level, and a brief description. Cards use indigo borders and text.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on the search bar focuses it for input. Clicking on a filter icon opens a dropdown menu with filtering options by category, difficulty level, and certification track.
Hovering over a course card slightly elevates it with a shadow effect for emphasis.

resource_dependency.courseDetailSchema: Database table 'courses' with fields: course_id (unique ID), title (string), description (text), category (string), difficulty_level (string), certification_track (string), schedule (datetime), enrollment_deadline (datetime), available_seats (integer), prerequisites (text), instructor (string), price (decimal), syllabus (text).

function: Display detailed course information pages including descriptions, prerequisites, and schedules.
static_description: A detailed course page featuring a header with course title and an indigo 'Enroll Now' button with an icon. Below, sections for description, prerequisites, schedule, syllabus, and instructor details are laid out in a clean, readable format with indigo headings on a lavender background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Enroll Now' button redirects the user to the enrollment flow.

resource_dependency.userSchema: Database table 'users' with fields: user_id (unique ID), name (string), email (string, unique), password_hash (string), phone (string), created_at (datetime).
resource_dependency.paymentAPI: Integration with a secure payment gateway API (e.g., Stripe) for handling transactions.
resource_dependency.enrollmentSchema: Database table 'enrollments' with fields: enrollment_id (unique ID), user_id (foreign key), course_id (foreign key), enrollment_date (datetime), payment_status (enum: pending, completed, failed), transaction_id (string).

function: Enable online course enrollment with user registration and payment processing.
static_description: A multi-step enrollment form displayed on a lavender background with indigo-styled input fields and buttons. Steps include user login/registration, course selection review, payment information entry, and confirmation.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Proceed to Payment' submits the form and initiates the payment process via the integrated payment API.
Submitting the registration form creates a new user record and redirects to the payment step.

resource_dependency.chatbotAPI: Integration with a conversational AI chatbot API (e.g., Dialogflow or Microsoft Bot Framework) for handling user queries.

function: Integrate a chatbot for user support and inquiries.
static_description: A fixed-position chat widget in the bottom-right corner of every page with a lavender-themed chat icon. When opened, a chat window appears with an indigo header and message bubbles.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the chat icon toggles the visibility of the chat window. User messages are sent via the integrated chatbot API for automated responses.

resource_dependency.contactFormSchema: Database table 'inquiries' with fields: inquiry_id (unique ID), name (string), email (string), subject (string), message (text), submitted_at (datetime).

function: Include a contact form for direct communication with the institute.
static_description: A contact form section with indigo-styled input fields for name, email, subject, and message on a lavender background. A 'Send Message' button with an icon is prominently displayed.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the form stores the inquiry in the database and sends a notification to the instituteâ€™s support team.

resource_dependency.certificationPathwaySchema: Database table 'certification_paths' with fields: path_id (unique ID), title (string), description (text), required_courses (array of course IDs), total_duration (string), completion_badge (string URL).
resource_dependency.progressTrackingSchema: Database table 'user_certifications' with fields: user_id (foreign key), path_id (foreign key), enrolled_date (datetime), progress_percentage (integer), completed (boolean), completion_date (datetime, nullable).

function: Present certification pathways with progress tracking and completion status.
static_description: A certification pathway page displaying a list of tracks with titles, descriptions, and progress bars styled in indigo on a lavender background. Each track shows the number of completed courses and a completion badge when earned.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a certification track navigates to its detailed view showing required courses and current progress.

resource_dependency.userAccountSchema: Database table 'users' with fields: user_id (unique ID), name (string), email (string, unique), password_hash (string), phone (string), profile_picture (string URL), created_at (datetime).

function: Implement user authentication and account management features.
static_description: A login/signup page with indigo-styled forms on a lavender background. Account management page includes editable fields for name, email, phone, and profile picture with save and cancel buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the login form authenticates the user and redirects to their dashboard. Submitting changes on the account page updates the user record.

function: Provide a responsive navigation menu and consistent page layout.
static_description: A fixed top navigation bar with a logo on the left, menu items centered, and a user profile icon on the right. All elements use indigo styling on a lavender background. Responsive collapse into a hamburger menu on smaller screens.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a menu item navigates to the corresponding page. Clicking the hamburger icon toggles the mobile menu.

function: Apply lavender background color and indigo component styling across all pages.
static_description: All pages feature a consistent lavender (#E6E6FA) background color with indigo (#4B0082) used for buttons, headers, and interactive components throughout the site.

function: Enable users to browse courses by category, difficulty level, or certification track.
static_description: Filter dropdowns positioned above the course catalog grid allowing users to sort courses by predefined categories, difficulty levels, and certification tracks. Indigo-styled dropdowns on a lavender background.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a filter option dynamically updates the course catalog grid to show only matching results.

function: Display course availability and enrollment deadlines.
static_description: Each course card in the catalog displays a small indicator showing remaining seats and the enrollment deadline in indigo text on a lavender background.

resource_dependency.dashboardLayoutSchema: User dashboard layout includes sections: Enrolled Courses, Certification Progress, Account Settings, and Support. Data sourced from 'enrollments', 'user_certifications', and 'users' tables.

function: Include a user dashboard to manage enrolled courses and certifications.
static_description: A dashboard page with a lavender background featuring indigo-styled cards for enrolled courses, certification progress, account settings, and support links. Each card provides quick access to relevant actions.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a course or certification card navigates to its respective detail page.

resource_dependency.searchFunctionalitySchema: Search index or query logic spanning 'courses' and 'certification_paths' tables based on title, description, and keywords.

function: Implement search functionality across course catalog and certification pathways.
static_description: A unified search bar in the header allows users to search both courses and certification pathways. Results appear in a dropdown list with indigo highlights on a lavender background.

interaction_and_states.description: As the user types, real-time suggestions are fetched and displayed in the dropdown.
Pressing Enter navigates to a results page listing matching courses and certification paths.

resource_dependency.receiptTemplate: HTML/CSS template for enrollment confirmation and receipt including user details, course info, payment amount, and transaction ID.
resource_dependency.confirmationEmailAPI: Service for sending automated emails via SMTP or third-party provider (e.g., SendGrid).

function: Provide confirmation and receipt generation for successful enrollments.
static_description: Upon successful enrollment and payment, a confirmation page displays a receipt with indigo headers and lavender background. An email with the same receipt is sent to the user.

resource_dependency.mobileResponsiveFramework: CSS media queries and flexible grid layouts for responsiveness

function: Ensure accessibility compliance and mobile-responsive design.
static_description: All pages are designed with semantic HTML, ARIA attributes, and scalable layouts that adapt to various screen sizes. Lavender backgrounds and indigo components maintain contrast and readability standards.
